about_the_game:
《腾起之蛇现世》《Rising Snake Present World》
It is a horror game based on Qimen Dunjia and Feng Shui, with the Nine Palaces of Qimen Dunjia as a reflection, showcasing the winding stories that take place on a real sized university campus.

Game Features
Abandoning past horror games, there are cabinets for good news and cabinets for bad news. Play this game in a combat style that aligns with China's Qimen Dunjia. The game contains a lot of professional knowledge about Qimen Dunjia, Feng Shui Kanyu, and making runes and symbols. Players who like magic can enjoy a feast of blessings, while horror game enthusiasts who do not understand magic can also play freely.

The hand decision system based on the Nine Palaces includes attack spells based on the Five Acts


Auxiliary Mantra adapted from Qimen Dunjia


In the game, some real spells have been adapted into relevant decryption games


There are also many unique props in the game as "helpers" to assist players in playing


Don't forget the most important Qimen Dunjia system, please look forward to the Qimen Visualization Plate at that time!


background story
Why are the classmates' eyes so strange on a peaceful and beautiful university campus? Why are there frequent homicides on campus? Is the teacher the murderer or the student the murderer or... is it human harm, ghost harm, or ghost harm? What strange story has happened in this school? At that time, please ask all the Taoists to investigate.

srzrhsz

----------------------------------------------------------------------
We are a small team of two, and due to various reasons, the process of game development has been relatively slow. But we will do our best to fix every bug, and we hope that all Taoist Priests can provide more opinions. If possible, we will also adopt it as appropriate!
Official QQ group：10093771

content_descriptors.notes:
Terrifying and bloody scenes

Including death hints

legal_notice:
The first part is that the copyright and intellectual property rights belong to the developer Yan Di who returned to his hometown. Some of the sound effects in the game use commercially available CC protocol sound effects. Some sound effects have been re produced. It is significantly different from the original sound effect. Some images also use commercially available CC protocol images. The writing and plot creation was entirely created by Emperor Yan returning to his hometown, and all game content cannot be re created without his permission. No game unpacking or resale of in-game materials is allowed. Otherwise, legal responsibility will be pursued.

In the second part, there will be no collection of users' personal privacy and data within the game.

The third part is that there are no secondary transactions or virtual currency transactions within the game, and there are no internal purchases or any other means. The game belongs to the buyout mechanism, which is a one-time lifelong ownership unless STEAM's policies change.

In the fourth part, the game has passed the adult content survey review and has been graded. Minors are prohibited from playing

The fifth part is that there are currently no prohibited sales areas for the game.

Please ensure that the content of this agreement can be executed by yourselves. If you have any objections, please contact the developer.
name: Rising snake:The present world

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 《Rising Snake》 is a semi sandbox horror decryption adventure game. A fictional university campus based on real size. A "Taoist" with special abilities. A twisted and bizarre story. Waiting for your arrival.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
